column1: #Text=" Lin says : " I do n't need to explain myself to you .
#Text=It is an honor to meet you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks for having us .
#Text=So , can I meet the new airbender ?
#Text=" Aiwei says : " Of course , right this way .
#Text=" Ikki says : " And this is the Air Acolyte dining hall where everyone eats .
#Text=He 's a new airbender too , like you guys .
#Text=" Daw says : " It 's so nice to meet you .
#Text=I heard this is the place to come for if you 're a new airbender .
#Text=" Meelo says : " You got that right , stranger .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Well , a couple of weeks ago , I woke up and suddenly I can do this .
